title: Goodreads: Best Books of the Month - July 2016
description:
Goodreads Best Books of the Month: July 2016
English | 6 Books | Various Genre | 18.1 MB

------------------------------------------------------------------------
These titles have been racing to the top of goodreads popularity charts!
------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Harry Potter and the Cursed Child - Parts One and Two (Harry Potter, #8) 
by J.K. Rowling 
Harry Potter returns! This brand-new play from J.K. Rowling, John Tiffany, and Jack Thorne is set 19 years after Deathly Hallows and depicts Harry as a fatigued family man working at the Ministry of Magic.

2. The Muse 
by Jessie Burton 
In Civil War Spain, artist Olive Schloss persuades a man named Isaac Robles to sell her work as his own. Decades later two worlds collide when Londoner Odelle Bastien discovers a painting simply signed I.R.

3. Dark Matter 
by Blake Crouch 
The movie rights have already sold for this sci-fi thriller that focuses on a man named Jason, who, after he's knocked unconscious by masked intruders, awakens to a world he doesn't remember or recognize.

4. Party of One: A Memoir in 21 Songs 
by Dave Holmes 
Former MTV VJâ€”and self-described odd man outâ€”Dave Holmes chronicles his childhood and rise to relative fame in this moving memoir set alongside a soundtrack of '80s, '90s, and '00s classics.

5. We Are Not Such Things: The Murder of a Young American, a South African Township, and the Search for Truth and Reconciliation 
by Justine van der Leun 
Fans of Serial and Making a Murderer will find themselves enthralled by this true-crime tale of how a justice system failed following the murder of a young American woman in apartheid-torn South Africa.

6. P.S. I Like You 
by Kasie West 
A simple scribble on a chemistry-class desk turns into a full-blown crush when high schooler Lily unwittingly sparks a correspondence with an unknown pen pal. Could the mystery guy be Mr. Right?
